channel.title: MBallSectionsDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Poll: Americans Want Pro-Family Policies Including Abortion Limits, Mifepristone Safeguards
item.description: Widespread support for having kids and raising a family is exactly why the Hawleys say they created Love Life Initiative.

item.title: Fulton County: ‘We Don’t Dispute’ 315,000 Votes Lacking Poll Workers’ Signatures Were Counted In 2020
item.description: 'When the law demands three signatures on tabulator tapes and the county fails to follow the rules, those 315,000 votes are, by definition, uncertifie...

item.title: Norman Podhoretz, R.I.P.
item.description: He fought zealously because the stakes were high.

item.title: Fact-Checking Trump’s Claim That Venezuela Stole Oil and Land from the U.S.
item.description: As is often the case, there is a kernel of a shade of truth in the president’s hyperbolic talk on social media.

item.title: Spike Lee’s Affordability Thriller
item.description: Highest 2 Lowest remakes Kurosawa for the DNC.

item.title: Trump's push to make oil drilling cheap again squeezes some states more than others
item.description: A Republican push to make drilling cheaper on federal land is creating new fiscal pressure for states that depend on oil and gas revenue, most notably...

item.title: Senate Democrats launch 2026 initiative to lower costs
item.description: Senate Democrats on Wednesday announced a 2026 initiative in which they'll push proposals to lower the costs of health care, energy, housing, grocerie...

item.title: Young Democrat launches House campaign against incumbent Bennie Thompson
item.description: A former counsel to two prominent U.S. senators announced Wednesday that he will challenge longtime Democratic Rep. Bennie Thompson of Mississippi.

item.title: Buried In Debt: Report Finds Government Spending Per Person Soared 10,000 Percent Over Last Century
item.description: 'While American families and businesses find a way to do more with less, the government does less with more,' said OpenTheBooks' John Hart.

item.title: Ending Mail-Order Abortion Would Fulfill 3 Trump Campaign Promises
item.description: The medical reasons that led prior FDAs to require in-person doctor visits before women could access the abortion pill still stand.

item.title: Trump says he thinks Dan Bongino wants to leave FBI
item.description: President Trump told reporters Wednesday that he believes FBI Deputy Director Dan Bongino is leaving the FBI.

item.title: Trump, Hegseth attend dignified transfer of guard members and translator killed in Syria
item.description: President Trump and Defense Secretary Pete Hegseth participated in the solemn duty of witnessing the dignified transfer of two Iowa National Guard mem...

item.title: State-Sanctioned Suicide Is The 4th Leading Cause Of Death In Canada
item.description: 'The doctors who advocate for it call it compassion, but ethical doctors are healers, not killers.'

item.title: The Arsenal of Democracy Can’t Be Backordered
item.description: We must push harder to build a capable American defense system for the 21st century.

item.title: Ford Pays the Price for Electric Vehicle Investments
item.description: Government mandates and subsidies drove the automaker to bet big on electric vehicles, leaving it now with a $19.5 billion loss.
